title: Follow the Sun
overview: The adventures of two free-lance magazine writers based in Hawaii. Barry Coe and Brett Halsey star as free-lance magazine writers Ben Gregory and Paul Templin in this hour-long film adventure series set in Hawaii. Other regulars include Gary Lockwood as Eric Jason, legman for the scribes; Gigi Perreau as Katherine Ann Richards, their part-time secretary and a Honolulu University student; and Jay Lanin as Lt. Frank Roper of the Honolulu Police.
